entry.title: $2500 // NO FEE! Huge 3 Bed in prime Crown Heights - 1 block from 2/5 Trains
entry.content:
Amazing opportunity to live less than 200 feet away from the 2/5 trains at President St or 3 train at Nostrand Ave: 2 blocks away.

The apartment itself is huge. Full floor through apartment with rooms to spare. Window, eat-in kitchen. Large living room. Large dining room. King size bedroom and full size bedroom. There's another room that can fit a king size bed. Tons of closet space throughout the apartment.

The area offers everything that you need: pharmacy, supermarket, fruit & veggie stand, cafe, restaurants, and so much more.
This apartment is conveniently located:
Directly across the 3,4 trains
A short walk to prospect park
Botanical gardens
Brooklyn public museum
Just 1 stop to franklin ave, bars cafes, restaurants,
And lots of shops, bars, restaurants, grocery, supermarkets, laundry, and much more...

For more info or to view this apartment call or text Meir @347-232-6317
